00037 namespace mqtt {
00038 
00039 class async_client;
00040 
00042 
00046 class topic
00047 {   
00049     std::string name_;
00050 
00052     async_client* cli_;
00053 
00054 public:
00058     typedef std::shared_ptr<topic> ptr_t;
00064     topic(const std::string& name, async_client& cli) : name_(name), cli_(&cli) {}
00069     std::string get_name() const { return name_; }
00079     idelivery_token_ptr publish(const void* payload, size_t n, int qos, bool retained);
00088     idelivery_token_ptr publish(const std::string& str, int qos, bool retained) {
00089         return publish(str.data(), str.length(), qos, retained);
00090     }
00097     idelivery_token_ptr publish(message_ptr msg);
00102     std::string to_str() const { return name_; }
00103 };
00104 
00108 typedef topic::ptr_t topic_ptr;
